title: 不知道是哪个mod引起的崩溃，也可能是游戏本身的问题，求解
author: Daiyangcheng
txt_content:
崩溃报告（crash-reports）

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----


WARNING: coremods are present:
  CustomSkinLoader (CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.11(1).jar)
  PlayerAPIPlugin (Player API.jar)
  Main (【防砍模组】OldAnimationsMod v2.4 FORGE MC1.8.9.jar)
  FMLLoadingPlugin (MemoryFix-0.3.jar)
  TickrateChanger (TickrateChanger-Mod-1.8.9.jar)
  FMLLoadingPlugin ([防砍动画未响应修复]OldAnimationsModUnresponsiveFix-1.0.jar)
  InputFix (**-%5B中文输入MOD%5D%5B1.8.9%5D.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge


// I bet Cylons wouldn't have this problem.


Time: 20-4-10 上午9:39
Description: Initializing game
